This guy just has a huge "kill me!" sign on his face. especially since smother > him.

posts.post_content:
Can get out of control incredibly fast. Lacks trample, but for a damn good reason.  
  
And when your opponent attempts to remove him on their turn, cast [Comet Storm](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Comet Storm) (or, if you're doing mono-green, [Strength of the Tajuru](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Strength of the Tajuru)) and laugh in their face.
